title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: I am thinking of investing a small amount of my portolio into this meme coin in the hope it has some success like Dogecoin & Shiba Inu have had in the past.I do not have any Doge or Shib and personally think great returns on these two have gone which is why I am prepared to take a gamble on Dogelon Mars.Is Dogelon Mars linked to Dogecoin? I assume it is which can only be a good thing with how Elon Musk pumps Dogecoin from time to time I just feel Dogelon Mars has a lot more room to grow compared to Doge & Shib which is why I am thinking of taking a gamble on it. Anyone else invested or know anything about Dogelon Mars and what levels it could reach next bull run?

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Is this the project you are talking about?https://dogelonmars.com/It has excellent graphics and has been around for quite some time. This could be a great opportunity because it is listed on major crypto exchanges. I hope that the ones being invested are managing the risk.

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: Why can't they come up with a cool and impressive name instead of a combination of dog and Elon that seems unfriendly? What is impressive is that it has been listed on some major exchanges like crypto.com, okex or kucoin. Investing in memes is not bad, just keep in mind that the higher the return, the higher the risk, as for the potential of the meme, I think no one can predict it because it has no utility or usecase, the meme is only pumped and dumped, so you guys should research and make your own decision.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on November 01, 2022, 12:28:44 AMI am thinking of investing a small amount of my portolio into this meme coin in the hope it has some success like Dogecoin & Shiba Inu have had in the past.I do not have any Doge or Shib and personally think great returns on these two have gone which is why I am prepared to take a gamble on Dogelon Mars.Is Dogelon Mars linked to Dogecoin? I assume it is which can only be a good thing with how Elon Musk pumps Dogecoin from time to time I just feel Dogelon Mars has a lot more room to grow compared to Doge & Shib which is why I am thinking of taking a gamble on it. Anyone else invested or know anything about Dogelon Mars and what levels it could reach next bull run?I don't invest to meme coins. I have my feeling that they're no longer going to be a thing in the next years. But if you insists and you like investing there, that's your decision that you may regret or may be happy with the result.Investing into that coin is like a gamble.I mean, almost every investment is a gamble so, invest with money that you're fairly okay to have it there and it sit it around for a long time if it's not making you profit.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: It is a gamble  however one that can bring high rewards I feel. I am happy to wait a year or two for a 100x but it might even come sooner then that. I will start to DCA into it now and hopefully it goes lower for a while before it shoots up in price. I will not invest much but in something like this you don’t have to, you just hope one day it shoots up in price and if it does I can then use the profit to invest into safer crypto.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on November 01, 2022, 01:58:38 AMIs this the project you are talking about?https://dogelonmars.com/It has excellent graphics and has been around for quite some time. This could be a great opportunity because it is listed on major crypto exchanges. I hope that the ones being invested are managing the risk.Yes that is the one, I just feel it is worth a gamble as anything related to Elon Musk seems to shoot up in price eventually.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: Smack That Ace on November 01, 2022, 02:52:44 AMWhy can't they come up with a cool and impressive name instead of a combination of dog and Elon that seems unfriendly? What is impressive is that it has been listed on some major exchanges like crypto.com, okex or kucoin. Investing in memes is not bad, just keep in mind that the higher the return, the higher the risk, as for the potential of the meme, I think no one can predict it because it has no utility or usecase, the meme is only pumped and dumped, so you guys should research and make your own decision.Yeah, I always think about that. Are names of meme coins now limited to Doge, Shiba, Elon, or other dogs?  Another meme coin that has a zillion supply. I advise you to be careful with this type of investment, they are always prone to scams or rug pulls even though they are listed in premium exchanges.Just like Shiba and Doge, buy and sell could be profitable but it may not be worth holding a long time to avoid being rekt.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: When doge got pumped and more shillers from meme tokens will come. i would not be surprised to see you are making this thread. I remember that this token was dead since last year caused by this token full with so many shillers without any sense. They are always shilling anytime. You can take it whatever you want. I just know that if this dogelon was a garbage token. What you have been saying above was actually BS. Since when this meme token linked to the doge coin? it has nothing to do with doge coin.

comments.author: eightdots
comments.body: There are thousands of meme coins of this type. I can't talk about their names anymore because enough has been mentioned. If you are planning to buy this type of meme coin and do it 100x, you must be very lucky. Because there are thousands of meme coins. I couldn't see any connection of this coin with doge. You may still want to try your luck. You can keep some in your wallet. I also have a wallet of these types of meme coins, but I don't expect any big gains. I bought it so as not to say I wish I had bought it if it was worth it.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Aren't we have enough of DOGE and SHIB? And now, Dogelon? It's hard to speculate on this one since it dropped -98% from its ATH and for sure there are just whales that tries to manipulate the market and that they can dump it on retailers. This is the way even before and I wouldn't be surprised if someone called crypto is just a scam if the market gets in turmoil again with this dead cat bounce.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Why not stick with Dogecoin itself? Even though there are a lot of meme coins out there, we all know that Dogecoin is the king, the original one, and other meme coins out there are just impostors of Dogecoin.So for me, Dogecoin is the Bitcoin in the meme coins world, which these new meme coins that popping are just hype and will vanish afterward.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: you better off investing in either doge or shib since they are the ones that usually gets influenced heavily by elon, the rest are just some clones coin that have lesser chance of being influenced by elon, this coin that you mentioned is just actually might be just taking elon names just for fame and popularity, might have nothing relation with doge coin at all, so I think investing in doge and shib in the right time is actually wiser honestly.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on November 01, 2022, 12:28:44 AMI am thinking of investing a small amount of my portolio into this meme coin in the hope it has some success like Dogecoin & Shiba Inu have had in the past.I do not have any Doge or Shib and personally think great returns on these two have gone which is why I am prepared to take a gamble on Dogelon Mars.Is Dogelon Mars linked to Dogecoin? I assume it is which can only be a good thing with how Elon Musk pumps Dogecoin from time to time I just feel Dogelon Mars has a lot more room to grow compared to Doge & Shib which is why I am thinking of taking a gamble on it. Anyone else invested or know anything about Dogelon Mars and what levels it could reach next bull run?- You know my friend, you can do whatever you want to do when it comes to investing because it's your money. You may have a point in what you said that you may have a higher chance of earning more with dogelon compared to Dogecoin or Shiba Inu.And it's good that you know the risk you're going to take if you want to invest in Dogelon, although I also found out that the coin is already around 16-17M$ from what I can see on coinmarketcap. the cycle of his volume in one day, which after all is not bad either.I've been wondering if I'll take the gamble of investing here in Dogelon like you. But even so, we should always be careful. Buy what we can afford to lose.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: If you are a fan of Elon then you should have bought Dogecoin when it was cheap. I suspect that you are one of the weak hands who regret buying a coin when it was cheap but when its price falls would also not buy for feeling too fearful that it might continue to fall. Dogelon Mars is a wrong investment. By the name itself it is very clear that it is nothing but a meme coin trying to take advantage of another meme coin.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: If you have thoughts like that, it might be a good idea to buy Dogelon and hold it for a while immediately. And even if that doesn't happen, at least you have followed your intuition and I think you must have your own analysis in determining the choice of coins.But it would be even better if you could analyze it more deeply so that you really know whether to keep investing in Dogelon Mars or look for other coins. And I hope you don't follow what we suggest before you can find other information that can give you more data.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: So I have been buying Dogelon Mars this last week and I have been wondering if there is a way to transfer to my ledger.I see there is however I have gone to do this but is saying the fee is 50,000,000 ELON which is currently £12ish. I have 500,000,000 ELON currently so this fee above is quite a big chunk, is there any other way of sending the crypto to my ledger at a cheaper fee or is this the only way?

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on November 01, 2022, 01:58:38 AMIs this the project you are talking about?https://dogelonmars.com/It has excellent graphics and has been around for quite some time. This could be a great opportunity because it is listed on major crypto exchanges. I hope that the ones being invested are managing the risk.I dont know, everything looks so legit in the first impression and could be something I always wanted to invest into. It does not seem they are making too much buzz about the presence of DOGELON coin. I never heard about it before. To my surprise they are literally having 650K followers and it's pretty awesome community support for this coin. I suspect the support is coming from Elon and DOGE fans combined, considering the names they have used for the project. However, realistically the project is meme based and with our great experience earlier I would say precautionary steps are needed. May be put few bucks now and then but not more than 500 bucks I guess? I am okay with it because the volume is pretty well for every 24 hours. Could be good choice could be bad one too.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: The biggest reason for the emergence of dog coins is the doge coin. Doge coin is a cryptocurrency that emerged as a joke, as many crypto money investors know, and even abandoned by its manufacturers. Until elon musk owns the doge coin. The popularity of this type of crypto money was first created by doge coin and then by elon musk. Now, why are you investing in such cryptocurrencies when the main thing is doge coin? Investing in meme coins is great, especially during the most grueling time of the bear season.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: zonefloor on November 13, 2022, 11:12:49 PMThe biggest reason for the emergence of dog coins is the doge coin. Doge coin is a cryptocurrency that emerged as a joke, as many crypto money investors know, and even abandoned by its manufacturers. Until elon musk owns the doge coin. The popularity of this type of crypto money was first created by doge coin and then by elon musk. Now, why are you investing in such cryptocurrencies when the main thing is doge coin? Investing in meme coins is great, especially during the most grueling time of the bear season.Obviously, that is the main reason why there are a sudden explosion of meme coins in the name of doge, Elon Musk and Dogecoin started it all. They have good success early, even have all time high. And then suddenly it was copied up to this day.But I guess for me, they are going to fail.I mean the rule of thumb here is who got to be the first one, Bitcoin did it, Axie did it and then we have Doge. So I don't see this coin being the next big thing or at least a good investment. Sorry to burst the bubble here.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on November 13, 2022, 06:52:48 PMSo I have been buying Dogelon Mars this last week and I have been wondering if there is a way to transfer to my ledger.What chain is it on? I didn't have time to research it. Just probably use your ERC-20 or something with your ledger. I'm not sure if ledger has acceptability with the actual dogelon mars token.Quote from: Flexystar on November 13, 2022, 07:08:33 PMI dont know, everything looks so legit in the first impression and could be something I always wanted to invest into. It does not seem they are making too much buzz about the presence of DOGELON coin. I never heard about it before. To my surprise they are literally having 650K followers and it's pretty awesome community support for this coin. I suspect the support is coming from Elon and DOGE fans combined, considering the names they have used for the project. However, realistically the project is meme based and with our great experience earlier I would say precautionary steps are needed. May be put few bucks now and then but not more than 500 bucks I guess? I am okay with it because the volume is pretty well for every 24 hours. Could be good choice could be bad one too. Basically all a gamble towards this. If it works, congratulations, if not, then make sure you are investing something that is okay to lose.
